entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 29.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 29. Wind chill minus 47 this morning and minus 38 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 32 with temperature rising to minus 27 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind becoming south 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 32 with temperature rising to minus 27 by morning. Wind chill near minus 43. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 33 in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Clearing late in the afternoon. Wind southeast 30 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 33 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 43 in the morning and minus 50 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
